# TCThumbstick

**Class**

Represents a single on-screen thumbstick.

## Declaration

```swift
class TCThumbstick
```

## Overview

This is mirrored by a `GCControllerDirectionPad` on the associated `GCController` instance.

## Inspecting a thumbstick

- **backgroundContents**: The contents for the background of the thumbstick.
- **hidesWhenNotPressed**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to hide the thumbstick when it is not being pressed.
- **highlightDuration**: The time it takes for a highlight to fade away, in seconds.
- **stickContents**: The contents for the thumbstick itself.
- **stickSize**: The size (width, height) of the thumbstick stick itself in points.

## Getting the collider shape

- **colliderShape**: The collider shape for the thumbstick.
- **TCColliderShape**: Defines the shape of a control collider.

## Controls

- **TCControl**: A protocol that defines the base properties and methods for all touch controls.
- **TCButton**: A control that represents a single on-screen button.
- **TCDirectionPad**: An object that represents a direction pad.
- **TCSwitch**: A control that represents a single on-screen switch.
- **TCThrottle**: Represents a single on-screen throttle - a one axis input.
- **TCTouchpad**: Represents a single on-screen touchpad that reports absolute coordinates or delta movements.

- NSObject
